nodes.text: New Calamar, also known as Camalar, was a city on the southern continent of the planet Esseles. It was named for the capital of Esseles, Calamar. New Calamar was the location of the Empire's Terril Naval Base.
When the Jatz musician Fitz Roi performed in Camalar, he wore the clothes of a Jedi Knight, which nearly led to his sponsor, Flangth-2-Go, ending their sponsorship.
